entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
